snippet: Yang won the Honda L.P.G.A. Thailand in Chonburi for her second L.P.G.A. Tour title, finishing with a three-under-par 69 for a two-stroke victory over the American Stacy Lewis and two others.
abstract: Amy Yang of South Korea wins Honda LPGA Thailand with three-under-par 69; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yang won the Honda L.P.G.A. Thailand in Chonburi for her second L.P.G.A. Tour title, finishing with a three-under-par 69 for a two-stroke victory over the American Stacy Lewis and two others.

headline.main: Second L.P.G.A. Victory for Amy Yang
